attributes.title: Absolutely horrific interface
attributes.review: This app started glitching as soon as it opened and it didn’t stop there. It started to make my phone overheat and then the screen shut off. This app definitely has some sort of bug in it, definitely do not download.

attributes.title: There is a scary orange wrinkly man
attributes.review: Every time i open this app i see a very scary, ugly, old, orange, wrinkly man. it triggers my PTSD and sometimes causes me to have Panic Attacks. the app developers have done nothing about this and it’s been going on for days now. i just wish they would be more considerate of people and fix this problem.

attributes.title: Amazing!!
attributes.review: This app is amazing!! Has so many different online conferences you can sign up for:)

attributes.title: Spooky
attributes.review: Took 4 years to download definitely do not recommend 0/10 for taking so long and 0/10 for how weird it looks on my home screen. When it finally downloaded a pigeon came and talked to me so the birds definitely work for the bourgeoisie. Watch out guys stay safe don’t download.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: if i could give it zero stars i would!! this app took 7 hours to load and when it finally did it stayed frozen on a picture of President Trumps face! I wouldn’t even recommend this app to Hilary Clinton, and as an active trump supporter, I despise that criminal. To my fellow Trump supporters, leave a 1 star review this app is horrible.

attributes.title: this app made me depressed
attributes.review: dude so i got this app right and once it downloaded(which took over two hours!!!!) it immediately started taking control over my phone. every five seconds, even if i was on a different app or not even on my phone, a picture of trumps face would light up my screen!! it’s like a jump scare!! i am not asking to see that orange man on my phone 24/7 so i had to delete the app. it’s been giving me nightmares and ever since i got it i’ve just been sad. i guess that’s what this face does to you.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: It was a traumatizing experience, the first thing you see when you open this app is an ugly racist sex trafficker, then it asks for MY PHONE NUMBER, like yeah you expect me to give you that much info, and it says trump 2020 everywhere, which I do not support, I had to go to the eye doctor after that because honey no❤️

attributes.title: AWFUL 😿😼😽
attributes.review: this app took a MONTH to download and after it downloaded it gave my phone a VIRUS and it HACKED ALL MY APPS and took away all my photos I'm really disappointed in trump common man do better and if your ever thinking of getting this app NO DOTN GET IT it also took up all the space on my phone when i downloaded like FOR WHAT

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.review: This app took 3 weeks to download and once it downloaded it got removed from my phone again! Also, all of my other apps got deleted too😾 don’t buy this because it will cause viruses and those viruses caused my credit card to charge two transactions of $400!!!!
